name: Peanut Butter Banana Acai Bowl
ingredients: 2 tbsp Sliced banana, crushed peanuts, and granola (for topping)
instructions: Add frozen acai puree, bananas, peanut butter, vanilla whey, and almond milk to blender
Blend on high until thick and creamy
Should be thicker than a regular smoothie
Top with sliced banana, crushed peanuts, and granola
Optional: Add honey drizzle, chia seeds, or coconut flakes
